topics.body:
I can look into something and instantly imagine anything.

My bag fell down and I wrote 3 song.
I looked at a wall and imagined some guy with a super penis smashing it.
I drank some water and imagined the micro organisms screaming in fear as they ride a water molecule like a roller coaster and travel down my throat to an acidic underwater town of my Stomaclantis.

Sometimes, it's cool.
Other times, it's just fucking sick.

topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b6943063687272d65d0000#post_54b6943063687272d65d0000
If I were to think about the word instead of meaning, I'd say food in a luxurious hotel served by a butler with a springy moustache and white tux.

He would also speak French and when ordering, he speaks Mexican loudly. He then comes back with a hot spoon in guacamole while wearing a sombrero that has bells.

^~God dammit I did it again.~^

topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b6943063687272d65d0000#post_54b6943063687272d65d0000
Actually a viable medical procedure. Been done numerous times. 

Also, ever wonder why epoxy glue stick fingers together very well? Originally, invented during the Vietnam war as a way of temporarily patching up wounded soldiers until you get 'em to a proper medic station.
